item.title: 失业率保持稳定，澳大利亚招聘增长放缓
item.description: 10 月份，澳大利亚的招聘增长放缓，失业率保持稳定，这凸显了劳动力市场对高利率的抵御能力。【原文：Australia’s run of hiring gains slowed in October, while the unemployment rate held steady, underscoring the resilience of the labor market to elevated interest rates.】

item.title: 与埃隆-马斯克的 X 竞争的蓝天公司如何抓住时机
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国大选中获胜以及埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在帮助他当选中所起的作用，让马斯克的社交网络服务 X 的一些用户开始寻找替代品。马斯克花了几个月的时间在 X（该网站的前身是 Twitter）上向他的 2 亿多追随者宣传特朗普的议程，并在特朗普获胜后进行了一次虚拟的胜利之旅。X 的政治右倾化让一些用户望而却步，而这一社交媒体迁移的主要受益者之一是【原文：Donald Trump’s US election victory — and Elon Musk’s role in helping to get him elected — has sent some users of Musk’s social networking service X searching for alternatives. Musk has spent months pushing Trump’s agenda to his more than 200 million followers on X, the site formerly known as Twitter, and has been taking a virtual victory lap since Trump’s win. X’s move toward the political right has turned some users away, and one of the key beneficiaries of this social media migration has been】

item.title: 澳大利亚将要求大型科技公司为公民的网络安全负责
item.description: 澳大利亚政府计划颁布法律，要求大型科技公司保护本国公民的网络安全，这是澳大利亚中左翼工党政府通过年龄限制和遏制错误信息等手段打击社交媒体的最新举措。【原文：The Australian government plans to enact laws requiring big tech firms to protect its citizens online, the latest move by the center-left Labor administration to crack down on social media including through age limits and curbs on misinformation.】

item.title: 英国制定自然信用自愿市场原则
item.description: 英国正在为自然信用自愿市场制定自己的原则，这是对旨在保护生物多样性的、主要是试验性的金融产品投下的信任票。【原文：The UK is setting out its own principles for the voluntary market for nature credits, representing a vote of confidence in a largely experimental financial product that’s intended to protect biodiversity.】

item.title: 泰铢在新兴亚洲最易受特朗普第二任期影响
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫，泰铢将成为最脆弱的亚洲新兴市场货币之一，因为该国严重依赖贸易。【原文：The Thai baht is poised to become one of the most vulnerable emerging market Asian currencies as Donald Trump returns to the White House, given the country’s heavy reliance on trade.】

item.title: B.Riley 再次推迟发布季报并再次亏损
item.description: B.Riley Financial Inc. 估计，在截至 9 月份的三个月里，该公司亏损 2.7 亿至 2.8 亿美元，因为该公司继续审查其财务状况，并推迟向股东提交季度报告。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc. estimated that it lost $270 million to $280 million in the three months through September, as the company continues to review its financials and delay filing quarterly reports to shareholders.】

item.title: 中东前景不明，美元飙升，石油下跌
item.description: 由于中东紧张局势可能缓和的迹象、美元飙升以及对需求的担忧，石油价格走低。【原文：Oil edged lower on signs of a possible de-escalation of tensions in the Middle East, a surging US dollar, and concerns about demand.】

item.title: 埃克森计划到 2026 年在得克萨斯州裁减近 400 个先锋职位
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）今年早些时候以 630 亿美元收购了先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources Co.【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. plans to lay off 397 employees from Pioneer Natural Resources Co. after purchasing the Permian Basin operator for $63 billion earlier this year.】

item.title: 中国出售美元债券收益率几乎与美国国债持平
item.description: 中国最近公布了支持萎靡不振的经济的计划，自 2021 年以来首次发行的美元债券获得了 400 多亿美元的投标。【原文：China, which recently unveiled plans to support its ailing economy, got more than $40 billion of bids for its first dollar bond issuance since 2021.】

item.title: 经济部长称墨西哥可调解中美争端
item.description: 墨西哥最高经济官员表示，在美国寻求与中国脱钩的过程中，墨西哥可以成为一个关键的中间人。【原文：Mexico’s top economy official said that his nation can be a key intermediary as the US seeks to decouple from China.】

item.title: Venture Global LNG 计划最快本周提交 30 亿美元的首次公开募股申请
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Venture Global LNG 公司计划最快于本周提交首次公开募股申请，募集资金可能超过 30 亿美元。【原文：Venture Global LNG Inc. is planning to file as soon as this week for an initial public offering that could raise more than $3 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 股市将上涨，交易员认为美联储下月将缩表：市场综述
item.description: 在美国通胀数据支持美联储下月再次降息之后，亚洲股市周四开始走高。【原文：Asian shares were primed to drift higher Thursday after US inflation data supported the case for another Federal Reserve rate cut next month.】

item.title: 比特币因特朗普议程和美联储政策前景短暂突破 93,000 美元
item.description: 在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普支持加密货币的立场的推动下，美联储进一步降息的预期使比特币短时间内飙升至 93,000 美元以上。【原文：Bitcoin spiked above $93,000 for a short period as expectations of further interest-rate reductions by the Federal Reserve added to the impetus from President-elect Donald Trump’s pro-crypto stance.】

item.title: 加拿大同意美国对墨西哥与中国贸易的担忧
item.description: 加拿大副总理克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）表示，美国对墨西哥贸易政策与其北美盟友在中国问题上不一致的担忧是 "合理的"，她也有同感。【原文：Canadian Deputy Prime Minister Chrystia Freeland said American concerns about Mexico’s trade policy not being in line with its North American allies on China are “legitimate,” and she shares them.】

item.title: 科技明星鲍勃-李被指控的杀手为自己辩护
item.description: 被指控杀害科技高管鲍勃-李（Bob Lee）的凶手站上证人席为自己辩护，讲述了自己的武术训练经历，试图说服旧金山陪审团相信，去年在旧金山一条街道上发生的致命冲突中，他并没有拔刀。【原文：Technology executive Bob Lee’s accused killer took the witness stand in his own defense, testifying about his martial arts training as he tries to convince a San Francisco jury that he didn’t pull the knife in a fatal confrontation on a city street last year.】

item.title: 霍邱尔计划重启纽约市拥堵收费计划，收费标准为 9 美元
item.description: 纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）计划恢复对进入曼哈顿大部分地区的司机征收交通拥堵费，几个月前，她曾在开始征收 15 美元交通拥堵费之前突然叫停，认为这会给工薪家庭和小企业造成压力。【原文：New York Governor Kathy Hochul plans to revive congestion pricing for drivers entering large parts of Manhattan, months after abruptly pulling the plug on a $15 charge just before it was set to start, arguing it would have strained working families and small businesses.】

item.title: 里夫斯计划制定法律创建养老金 "巨型基金"，推动英国经济增长
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）表示，随着工党新政府努力兑现其促进私人投资和经济增长的承诺，英国将于明年出台立法，将1.3万亿英镑（1.7万亿美元）的养老金储蓄集中到一系列 "巨型基金 "中。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves said the UK will introduce legislation next year to pool £1.3 trillion ($1.7 trillion) of pension savings into a series of “megafunds,” as the new Labour government tries to deliver on its pledge to boost private investment and economic growth.】

item.title: 中国经济预计将在刺激政策后小幅回升
item.description: 中国经济上个月可能获得了增长势头，早期指标显示，在政府于 9 月下旬开始推出刺激措施后，中国经济出现了反弹。【原文：China’s economy likely gained momentum last month, with early indicators pointing to a rebound after the government began rolling out stimulus measures in late September.】

item.title: 大卫-艾因霍恩透露押注农业公司 CNH，股价大涨
item.description: 大卫-艾因霍恩（David Einhorn）透露了在农业设备公司 CNH Industrial NV 的新头寸，该公司股价在纽约下午 4 点 41 分上涨了 7.5%，达到 10.80 美元。【原文：David Einhorn revealed a new position in agriculture equipment company CNH Industrial NV, whose shares rose 7.5% to $10.80 at 4:41 p.m. in New York.】

item.title: 鸡肉需求旺盛，JBS 利润飙升至两年新高
item.description: 全球最大的肉类生产商 JBS SA 正从世界鸡肉消费的增长中获益，鸡肉需求激增，帮助该公司实现了两年来最好的季度利润。【原文：JBS SA, the biggest global meat producer, is reaping the benefits of a world that’s eating more chicken, sending demand surging and helping the company post its best quarterly profits in two years.】

item.title: Nu 股本回报率创历史新高，数字银行业绩超出预期
item.description: Nu Holdings Ltd. 公布的第三季度利润超过了分析师的预期，原因是这家数字银行加快了在拉丁美洲的存款和贷款业务。【原文：Nu Holdings Ltd. posted a third-quarter profit that beat analysts’ estimates as the digital bank accelerated deposits and its lending business in Latin America.】

item.title: 美国指责中国对电信业进行大规模网络间谍活动
item.description: 美国官员周三在一份声明中说，中国国家支持的黑客实施了 "广泛而重大的网络间谍活动"，入侵了多家电信公司，证实了更多有关对国家安全有重大影响的网络攻击的细节。【原文：Chinese state-sponsored hackers perpetrated a “broad and significant cyber-espionage campaign” in which they breached multiple telecommunications companies, US officials said in a statement on Wednesday, confirming additional details about cyberattacks with major national security implications.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜促使澳大利亚养老基金增加私人信贷
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老金和财富管理公司之一 Colonial First State 计划加速推进私人信贷投资，以对冲唐纳德-特朗普潜在的通胀政策。【原文：Colonial First State, one of Australia’s largest pension and wealth managers, plans to accelerate its push into private credit investments to hedge against potential inflationary policies of Donald Trump.】
